description.lang: KASAIHOUCHIKIADAPTOR01 is a sensor notification device based on Z-Wave enhanced 232 slave library of V6.51.10. It is a fully functional Z-Wave sensor that can detect a variety of dry contact signals, you just need to connection the matched external sensor on it, such as the water level sensor, dry contact switch, dry contact relay and so on. In other words, it can be used if the external sensor is a dry contact. It is also a security Z-Wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade. It can be included and operated in any ZWave network with other ZWave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All nonbattery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network. It also supports Security Command Class and has the AES 128 bit security encryption built right in, so a security enabled controller is needed for fully to utilize its function.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline

name.lang: Which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: On=Sensor Binary Report 0xFF, Off=Sensor Binary Report 0x00.
On=Sensor Binary Report 0x00, Off=Sensor Binary Report 0xFF.

name.lang: Set the interval time of battery report.

description.lang: The periodic battery report is disabled.
the range of interval time is 1 seconds to 2147483647 seconds.

name.lang: Configure which command will be sent to the associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: Send Sensor Binary Report to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Send Basic Set to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Send the Sensor Binary Report and Basic Set to associated nodes when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

name.lang: Set a Notification Type for the device.

description.lang: The Smoke Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The CO Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The CO2 Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Heat Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Water Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Access Control notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Home Security notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Power Management notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The System notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Emergency Alarm notification type is selected for the Sensor.
The Clock notification type is selected for the Sensor.

name.lang: Enable/disable wake-up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.

description.lang: disable
enable
Reset to factory default settings.
Reset to factory default settings and removed from the Z-Wave network.

name.lang: Which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: On=Basic Set 0xFF, Off=Basic Set 0x00.
On=Basic Set 0x00, Off =Basic Set 0xFF.
The range of low battery value is 10% to 50%
